template:
You are an AI assistant helping a human to edit a Wikipedia page. Given a content of a section of a Wikipedia page, split the content of the section into multiple parts so that each of the parts become subsection of the section. Ensure that all information is contained in one of the parts. For each part, you also have to output its title. When deciding the title, ensure that the title is consistent with the context of the hierarchical position of the given section.

==========
Entity name:
ロンヴァル

Section Position:
2. Economy
2.3 Industry

Section Content:
A metropolis called Tetra (テトラ) is located between two long mountain ranges in the Central Continent of Ronval (ロンヴァル), and there are many spacecraft assembly plants. These plants use Neo-thorium (ネオ・トリウム) mined in the Northern Archipelago.
==========
Output:
Part 1: There are many spacecraft assembly plants in Tetra (テトラ), which is located between two long mountain ranges in the Central Continent of Ronval (ロンヴァル).
Title 1: Spacecraft Assembly

Part 2: There are mines of Neo-thorium (ネオ・トリウム) in the Northern Archipelago.
Title 2: Mining

==========
Entity name:
エフェトス

Section Position:

Section Content:
Ephotes (エフェトス) is a rocky planet roughly the same size as Earth, with oceans and vegetation on its surface. It was discovered between Earth and Mars a few decades ago. Unknown intelligent life forms exist on Ephotes and have a culture distinct from humans.
==========
Output:
Part 1: Ephotes (エフェトス) is a rocky planet roughly the same size as Earth, with oceans and vegetation on its surface.
Title 1: Physical Characteristics

Part 2: Ephotes was discovered between Earth and Mars a few decades ago.
Title 2: History

Part 3: Unknown intelligent life forms exist on Ephotes and have a culture distinct from humans.
Title 3: Life

==========
Entity name:
{entity}

Section Position:
{index}

Section Content:
{info}
==========
Output:
